@DrTedros @AfricaCDC @MedsPatentPool @_AfricanUnion "We believe the mRNA Technology Transfer Hub holds huge promise, not just for increasing access to vaccines against #COVID19, but also for other diseases including malaria, tuberculosis and cancer"-@DrTedros #VaccinEquity

@DrTedros "One of the most obvious lessons of the #COVID19 pandemic, therefore, is the urgent need to increase local production of vaccines, especially in low- and middle-income countries"-@DrTedros #VaccinEquity

@DrTedros "And of course, vaccines have helped to change the course of the #COVID19 pandemic. But this scientific triumph has been undermined by vast inequities in access to these life-saving tools"-@DrTedros #VaccinEquity https://t.co/E0EbATazU8

@DrTedros @ACTAccelerator @UNICEF @gavi "Thank you all for your commitment. Actions speak louder than words ‚Äì so let‚Äôs get to work, to get vaccines from ports to arms, and end #COVID19 as a global health emergency"-@DrTedros #PortsToArms #VaccinEquity https://t.co/F07wOOHAP3

@DrTedros @ACTAccelerator "To support these actions, WHO, @UNICEF and @gavi have initiated the #COVID19 Vaccine Delivery Partnership, to assist government-led vaccine strategies through political engagement, delivery funding, technical assistance and surge support"-@DrTedros #PortsToArms #VaccinEquity

@DrTedros @ACTAccelerator "High level political leadership and accountability in elevating #COVID19 vaccination as a national and sub-national priority is an essential condition for success"-@DrTedros #PortsToArms #VaccinEquity

@DrTedros @ACTAccelerator "Achieving the 70% target in all countries is essential for ending the #COVID19 pandemic as a global health emergency and driving a truly inclusive global recovery"-@DrTedros #PortsToArms #VaccinEquity
